verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went שִׁמְשׁ֖וֹן <WH8123> Samson עַזָּ֑תָה <WH5804> to Gaza וַיַּרְא־ <WH7200> and saw שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> ess זוֹנָ֔ה <WH2181> commit fornication וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and went in אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH413> to

לַֽעַזָּתִ֣ים ׀ <WH5841> [And it was told] the Gazites לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying בָּ֤א <WH935> is come שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <WH8123> Samson הֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> here וַיָּסֹ֛בּוּ <WH5437> hither And they compassed [him] in וַיֶּאֶרְבוּ־ <WH693> and laid wait ל֥וֹ כָל־ <WH3605> all הַלַּ֖יְלָה <WH3915> for him all night בְּשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> in the gate הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> of the city וַיִּתְחָרְשׁ֤וּ <WH2790> and were quiet כָל־ <WH3605> all הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <WH3915> all the night לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying עַד־ <WH5704> until א֥וֹר <WH216> when it is day הַבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> In the morning וַהֲרְגְנֻֽהוּ׃ <WH2026> we shall kill

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH7901> lay שִׁמְשׁוֹן֮ <WH8123> And Samson עַד־ <WH5704> until חֲצִ֣י <WH2677> half הַלַּיְלָה֒ <WH3915> night וַיָּ֣קָם ׀ <WH6965> and arose בַּחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> half הַלַּ֗יְלָה <WH3915> night וַיֶּאֱחֹ֞ז <WH270> and took בְּדַלְת֤וֹת <WH1817> the doors שַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> of the gate הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city וּבִשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> and the two הַמְּזוּז֔וֹת <WH4201> posts וַיִּסָּעֵם֙ <WH5265> and went away עִֽם־ <WH5973> along הַבְּרִ֔יחַ <WH1280> with them bar וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <WH7760> and all and put עַל־ <WH5921> on כְּתֵפָ֑יו <WH3802> [them] upon his shoulders וַֽיַּעֲלֵם֙ <WH5927> and carried them up אֶל־ <WH413> up רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> to the top הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> of an hill אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [is] before חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <WH2275> Hebron פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And it came to pass afterward כֵ֔ן <WH3651> this וַיֶּאֱהַ֥ב <WH157> that he loved אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> a woman בְּנַ֣חַל <WH5158> in the valley שֹׂרֵ֑ק <WH7796> of Sorek וּשְׁמָ֖הּ <WH8034> whose name דְּלִילָֽה׃ <WH1807> [was] Delilah

וַיַּעֲל֨וּ <WH5927> came up אֵלֶ֜יהָ <WH413> about סַרְנֵ֣י <WH5633> And the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיֹּ֨אמְרוּ <WH559> unto her and said לָ֜הּ פַּתִּ֣י <WH6601> unto her Entice אוֹת֗וֹ <WH853> וּרְאִי֙ <WH7200> him and see בַּמֶּה֙ <WH4100> where כֹּח֣וֹ <WH3581> strength גָד֔וֹל <WH1419> wherein his great וּבַמֶּה֙ <WH4100> and how נ֣וּכַל <WH3201> [lieth] and by what [means] we may prevail ל֔וֹ וַאֲסַרְנֻ֖הוּ <WH631> against him that we may bind לְעַנֹּת֑וֹ <WH6031> him to afflict וַאֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH587> we נִתַּן־ <WH5414> him and we will give לָ֔ךְ אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> thee every one אֶ֥לֶף <WH505> thousand וּמֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> hundred כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> [pieces] of silver

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דְּלִילָה֙ <WH1807> And Delilah אֶל־ <WH413> to שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <WH8123> to Samson הַגִּֽידָה־ <WH5046> Tell נָּ֣א <WH4994> Please לִ֔י בַּמֶּ֖ה <WH4100> where כֹּחֲךָ֣ <WH3581> strength גָד֑וֹל <WH1419> me I pray thee wherein thy great וּבַמֶּ֥ה <WH4100> is and how תֵאָסֵ֖ר <WH631> [lieth] and wherewith thou mightest be bound לְעַנּוֹתֶֽךָ׃ <WH6031> to afflict

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> about שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <WH8123> And Samson אִם־ <WH518> to her If יַאַסְרֻ֗נִי <WH631> unto her If they bind בְּשִׁבְעָ֛ה <WH7651> me with seven יְתָרִ֥ים <WH3499> withs לַחִ֖ים <WH3892> green אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> have not חֹרָ֑בוּ <WH2717> that were never dried וְחָלִ֥יתִי <WH2470> then shall I be weak וְהָיִ֖יתִי <WH1961> and be like כְּאַחַ֥ד <WH259> and be as another הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> man

וַיַּעֲלוּ־ <WH5927> brought up לָ֞הּ סַרְנֵ֣י <WH5633> Then the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines שִׁבְעָ֛ה <WH7651> to her seven יְתָרִ֥ים <WH3499> withs לַחִ֖ים <WH3892> green אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> had not חֹרָ֑בוּ <WH2717> which had not been dried וַתַּאַסְרֵ֖הוּ <WH631> and she bound בָּהֶֽם׃

וְהָאֹרֵ֗ב <WH693> Now [there were] men lying in wait יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> abiding לָהּ֙ בַּחֶ֔דֶר <WH2315> with her in the chamber וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And she said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him פְּלִשְׁתִּ֥ים <WH6430> unto him The Philistines עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> and שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <WH8123> [be] upon thee Samson וַיְנַתֵּק֙ <WH5423> And he brake אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְתָרִ֔ים <WH3499> the withs כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יִנָּתֵ֤ק <WH5423> is broken פְּתִֽיל־ <WH6616> as a thread הַנְּעֹ֙רֶת֙ <WH5296> of tow בַּהֲרִיח֣וֹ <WH7306> when it toucheth אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> the fire וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> was not נוֹדַ֖ע <WH3045> was not known כֹּחֽוֹ׃ <WH3581> So his strength

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דְּלִילָה֙ <WH1807> And Delilah אֶל־ <WH413> to שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <WH8123> unto Samson הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold הֵתַ֣לְתָּ <WH2048> Behold thou hast mocked בִּ֔י וַתְּדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> me and told אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about כְּזָבִ֑ים <WH3576> fail עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now הַגִּֽידָה־ <WH5046> now tell נָּ֣א <WH4994> please לִ֔י בַּמֶּ֖ה <WH4100> how תֵּאָסֵֽר׃ <WH631> me I pray thee wherewith thou mightest be bound

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> to her אִם־ <WH518> If אָס֤וֹר <WH631> unto her If they bind יַאַסְר֙וּנִי֙ <WH631> me fast בַּעֲבֹתִ֣ים <WH5688> ropes חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <WH2319> with new אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נַעֲשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> accomplish בָהֶ֖ם מְלָאכָ֑ה <WH4399> been used וְחָלִ֥יתִי <WH2470> then shall I be weak וְהָיִ֖יתִי <WH1961> and be like כְּאַחַ֥ד <WH259> and be as another הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> man

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> therefore took דְּלִילָה֩ <WH1807> Delilah עֲבֹתִ֨ים <WH5688> ropes חֲדָשִׁ֜ים <WH2319> new וַתַּאַסְרֵ֣הוּ <WH631> and bound בָהֶ֗ם וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> him therewith and said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him פְּלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <WH6430> unto him The Philistines עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> and שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <WH8123> [be] upon thee Samson וְהָאֹרֵ֖ב <WH693> And [there were] liers in wait יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> abiding בֶּחָ֑דֶר <WH2315> in the chamber וַֽיְנַתְּקֵ֛ם <WH5423> And he brake מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from זְרֹעֹתָ֖יו <WH2220> them from off his arms כַּחֽוּט׃ <WH2339> like a thread

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דְּלִילָ֜ה <WH1807> And Delilah אֶל־ <WH413> to שִׁמְשׁ֗וֹן <WH8123> unto Samson עַד־ <WH5704> Up הֵ֜נָּה <WH2008> Hitherto הֵתַ֤לְתָּ <WH2048> thou hast mocked בִּי֙ וַתְּדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> me and told אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about כְּזָבִ֔ים <WH3576> fail הַגִּ֣ידָה <WH5046> tell לִּ֔י בַּמֶּ֖ה <WH4100> how תֵּאָסֵ֑ר <WH631> me wherewith thou mightest be bound וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> to her אִם־ <WH518> If תַּאַרְגִ֗י <WH707> unto her If thou weavest אֶת־ <WH853> שֶׁ֛בַע <WH7651> the seven מַחְלְפ֥וֹת <WH4253> locks רֹאשִׁ֖י <WH7218> of my head עִם־ <WH5973> with הַמַּסָּֽכֶת׃ <WH4545> with the web

וַתִּתְקַע֙ <WH8628> And she fastened בַּיָּתֵ֔ד <WH3489> [it] with the pin וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him פְּלִשְׁתִּ֥ים <WH6430> unto him The Philistines עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> and שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <WH8123> [be] upon thee Samson וַיִּיקַץ֙ <WH3364> And he awaked מִשְּׁנָת֔וֹ <WH8142> out of his sleep וַיִּסַּ֛ע <WH5265> and went away אֶת־ <WH854> out הַיְתַ֥ד <WH3489> with the pin הָאֶ֖רֶג <WH708> of the beam וְאֶת־ <WH854> for הַמַּסָּֽכֶת׃ <WH4545> and with the web

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And she said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> unto him How תֹּאמַ֣ר <WH559> canst thou say אֲהַבְתִּ֔יךְ <WH157> I love וְלִבְּךָ֖ <WH3820> thee when thine heart אֵ֣ין <WH369> else אִתִּ֑י <WH854> for זֶ֣ה <WH2088> these שָׁלֹ֤שׁ <WH7969> me these three פְּעָמִים֙ <WH6471> times הֵתַ֣לְתָּ <WH2048> [is] not with me? thou hast mocked בִּ֔י וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <WH5046> and hast not told לִּ֔י בַּמֶּ֖ה <WH4100> where כֹּחֲךָ֥ <WH3581> strength גָדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> me wherein thy great

וַ֠יְהִי <WH1961> came כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when הֵצִ֨יקָה <WH6693> And it came to pass when she pressed לּ֧וֹ בִדְבָרֶ֛יהָ <WH1697> with her words כָּל־ <WH3605> him הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> him daily וַתְּאַֽלֲצֵ֑הוּ <WH509> and urged וַתִּקְצַ֥ר <WH7114> was vexed נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> him [so] that his soul לָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> unto death

וַיַּגֶּד־ <WH5046> That he told לָ֣הּ אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> her all לִבּ֗וֹ <WH3820> her all his heart וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and said לָהּ֙ מוֹרָה֙ <WH4177> a razor לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has never עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> unto her There hath not come עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשִׁ֔י <WH7218> upon mine head כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נְזִ֧יר <WH5139> for I [have been] a Nazarite אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> unto God אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I מִבֶּ֣טֶן <WH990> womb אִמִּ֑י <WH517> from my mother's אִם־ <WH518> If גֻּלַּ֙חְתִּי֙ <WH1548> if I be shaven וְסָ֣ר <WH5493> will go מִמֶּ֣נִּי <WH4480> then כֹחִ֔י <WH3581> then my strength וְחָלִ֥יתִי <WH2470> from me and I shall become weak וְהָיִ֖יתִי <WH1961> and be like כְּכָל־ <WH3605> any הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> and be like any [other] man

וַתֵּ֣רֶא <WH7200> saw דְלִילָ֗ה <WH1807> And when Delilah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִגִּ֣יד <WH5046> that he had told לָהּ֮ אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> her all לִבּוֹ֒ <WH3820> her all his heart וַתִּשְׁלַ֡ח <WH7971> she sent וַתִּקְרָא֩ <WH7121> and called לְסַרְנֵ֨י <WH5633> for the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <WH6430> of the Philistines לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> saying עֲל֣וּ <WH5927> Come up הַפַּ֔עַם <WH6471> this once כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִגִּ֥יד <WH5046> for he hath shewed [לָהּ כ] (לִ֖י ק) אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all לִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> me all his heart וְעָל֤וּ <WH5927> came up אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> then סַרְנֵ֣י <WH5633> Then the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> unto her and brought הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> money בְּיָדָֽם׃ <WH3027> in their hand

וַתְּיַשְּׁנֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH3462> And she made him sleep עַל־ <WH5921> on בִּרְכֶּ֔יהָ <WH1290> upon her knees וַתִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> and she called לָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> for a man וַתְּגַלַּ֕ח <WH1548> and she caused him to shave off אֶת־ <WH853> שֶׁ֖בַע <WH7651> the seven מַחְלְפ֣וֹת <WH4253> locks רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> of his head וַתָּ֙חֶל֙ <WH2490> and she began לְעַנּוֹת֔וֹ <WH6031> to afflict וַיָּ֥סַר <WH5493> went כֹּח֖וֹ <WH3581> him and his strength מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And she said פְּלִשְׁתִּ֥ים <WH6430> The Philistines עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> and שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <WH8123> [be] upon thee Samson וַיִּקַ֣ץ <WH3364> And he awoke מִשְּׁנָת֗וֹ <WH8142> out of his sleep וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אֵצֵ֞א <WH3318> I will go out כְּפַ֤עַם <WH6471> as at other times before בְּפַ֙עַם֙ <WH6471> times וְאִנָּעֵ֔ר <WH5287> and shake וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יָדַ֔ע <WH3045> myself And he wist כִּ֥י <WH3588> that יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> not that the LORD סָ֥ר <WH5493> was departed מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַיֹּאחֲז֣וּהוּ <WH270> took פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> But the Philistines וַֽיְנַקְּר֖וּ <WH5365> him and put out אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> his eyes וַיּוֹרִ֨ידוּ <WH3381> and brought him down אוֹת֜וֹ <WH853> עַזָּ֗תָה <WH5804> to Gaza וַיַּאַסְר֙וּהוּ֙ <WH631> and bound בַּֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֔יִם <WH5178> him with fetters of brass וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become טוֹחֵ֖ן <WH2912> and he did grind בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> house [הָאֲסִירִים כ] (הָאֲסוּרִֽים׃ <WH615> bound ק)
וַיָּ֧חֶל <WH2490> began שְׂעַר־ <WH8181> Howbeit the hair רֹאשׁ֛וֹ <WH7218> of his head לְצַמֵּ֖חַ <WH6779> to grow again כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after גֻּלָּֽח׃ <WH1548> he was shaven פ

וְסַרְנֵ֣י <WH5633> Then the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines נֶֽאֱסְפוּ֙ <WH622> gathered them together לִזְבֹּ֧חַ <WH2076> for to offer זֶֽבַח־ <WH2077> sacrifice גָּד֛וֹל <WH1419> a great לְדָג֥וֹן <WH1712> unto Dagon אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> their god וּלְשִׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> and to rejoice וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> for they said נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> hath delivered אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> Our god בְּיָדֵ֔נוּ <WH3027> into our hand אֵ֖ת <WH853> שִׁמְשׁ֥וֹן <WH8123> Samson אוֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <WH341> our enemy

וַיִּרְא֤וּ <WH7200> saw אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> And when the people וַֽיְהַלְל֖וּ <WH1984> him they praised אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their god כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָמְר֗וּ <WH559> for they said נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> hath delivered אֱלֹהֵ֤ינוּ <WH430> Our god בְיָדֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH3027> into our hands אֶת־ <WH853> א֣וֹיְבֵ֔נוּ <WH341> our enemy וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מַחֲרִ֣יב <WH2717> and the destroyer אַרְצֵ֔נוּ <WH776> of our country וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Who הִרְבָּ֖ה <WH7235> many אֶת־ <WH853> חֲלָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH2491> which slew

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> happened [כִּי <WH3588> for כ] [טֹוב כ] (כְּטֹ֣וב <WH2896> good ק) לִבָּ֔ם <WH3820> And it came to pass when their hearts וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> that they said קִרְא֥וּ <WH7121> Call לְשִׁמְשׁ֖וֹן <WH8123> for Samson וִישַֽׂחֶק־ <WH7832> that he may make us sport לָ֑נוּ וַיִּקְרְא֨וּ <WH7121> And they called לְשִׁמְשׁ֜וֹן <WH8123> for Samson מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house [הָאֲסִירִים כ] (הָאֲסוּרִ֗ים <WH615> bound ק) וַיְצַחֵק֙ <WH6711> sport לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> and he made them וַיַּעֲמִ֥ידוּ <WH5975> and they set אוֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between הָעַמּוּדִֽים׃ <WH5982> him between the pillars

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> called שִׁמְשׁ֛וֹן <WH8123> And Samson אֶל־ <WH413> about יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> GOD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> O Lord יֱהֹוִ֡ה <WH3068> unto the LORD זָכְרֵ֣נִי <WH2142> remember נָא֩ <WH4994> please וְחַזְּקֵ֨נִי <WH2388> me I pray thee and strengthen נָ֜א <WH4994> and please אַ֣ךְ <WH389> just הַפַּ֤עַם <WH6471> me I pray thee only this once הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> O God וְאִנָּקְמָ֧ה <WH5358> be avenged נְקַם־ <WH5359> avenged אַחַ֛ת <WH259> that I may be at once מִשְּׁתֵ֥י <WH8147> for my two עֵינַ֖י <WH5869> eyes מִפְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שִׁמְשׁ֗וֹן <WH8123> And Samson תָּמ֣וֹת <WH4191> that [were] therein So the dead נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> any עִם־ <WH5973> with פְּלִשְׁתִּים֒ <WH6430> with the Philistines וַיֵּ֣ט <WH5186> And he bowed בְּכֹ֔חַ <WH3581> himself with [all his] might וַיִּפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> fell הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> and the house עַל־ <WH5921> on הַסְּרָנִ֔ים <WH5633> upon the lords וְעַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and upon all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בּ֑וֹ וַיִּהְי֤וּ <WH1961> become הַמֵּתִים֙ <WH4191> which he slew אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom הֵמִ֣ית <WH4191> than [they] which he slew בְּמוֹת֔וֹ <WH4194> at his death רַבִּ֕ים <WH7227> were more מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הֵמִ֖ית <WH4191> killed בְּחַיָּֽיו׃ <WH2416> in his life

וַיֵּרְד֨וּ <WH3381> came down אֶחָ֜יו <WH251> Then his brethren וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and all the house אָבִיהוּ֮ <WH1> of his father וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> and took אֹתוֹ֒ <WH853> וַֽיַּעֲל֣וּ ׀ <WH5927> him and brought [him] up וַיִּקְבְּר֣וּ <WH6912> and buried אוֹת֗וֹ <WH853> בֵּ֤ין <WH996> between צָרְעָה֙ <WH6881> him between Zorah וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between אֶשְׁתָּאֹ֔ל <WH847> and Eshtaol בְּקֶ֖בֶר <WH6913> in the buryingplace מָנ֣וֹחַ <WH4495> of Manoah אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וְה֛וּא <WH1931> he שָׁפַ֥ט <WH8199> And he judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years פ
